sentences.sContent: The war and the corresponding fall in trade have had a devastating effect on the country.
sentences.sCn: 战争以及由此所导致的贸易量下降对这个国家产生了致命的影响。

sentences.sContent: ...Answer the questions by marking the corresponding letter on Answer Sheet 2...

...on the best choice and mark the corresponding batter on Answer Sheet 2 with a single line through the centre...
...Please mark the corresponding letter for each item on Answer Sheet 2 with a single line through the centre...
